Package org.hibernate.persister.entity

Class DiscriminatorHelper

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.persister.entity.DiscriminatorHelper
@Internal public class DiscriminatorHelper extends Object
Operations needed by persisters for working with discriminators.

    • getDiscriminatorType

      public static <T> SqmExpressible<? super T> getDiscriminatorType(SqmPathSource<T> domainType, NodeBuilder nodeBuilder)
      Utility that computes the node type used in entity or embeddable type literals. Resolves to either the DiscriminatorType, for polymorphic domain types, or to Class for non-inherited ones.
